title: Manipulating Arrays with dropRightWhile
description: In this lab, we will learn how to remove elements from the end of an array based on a specified function. The dropRightWhile function will loop through the array and remove elements from the right until the function returns true. The remaining elements of the array will then be returned. This lab will help you understand how to manipulate arrays in JavaScript using higher-order functions.

meta.title: JavaScript Array Manipulation | Array Functions | Coding Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to remove elements from the end of an array based on a specified function using the dropRightWhile function in JavaScript. Improve your array manipulation skills with this coding tutorial.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Array, Manipulation, Functions, Coding, Tutorials

steps.title: Drop Array Elements From the Right Based on Function

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 使用 dropRightWhile 操作数组
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将学习如何根据指定函数从数组末尾移除元素。dropRightWhile 函数会遍历数组，并从右侧开始移除元素，直到该函数返回 true。然后将返回数组中剩余的元素。本实验将帮助你理解如何使用高阶函数在 JavaScript 中操作数组。

meta.title: JavaScript 数组操作 | 数组函数 | 编码教程
meta.description: 学习如何使用 JavaScript 中的 dropRightWhile 函数根据指定函数从数组末尾移除元素。通过本编码教程提升你的数组操作技能。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 数组, 操作, 函数, 编码, 教程

steps.title: 根据函数从数组右侧删除元素
